basic_information.scholarship_name: The Jo Bazhaw Future Teacher Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - The Jo Bazhaw Future Teacher Endowed Schola

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are preparing for a teaching career. Eligibility Requirements Student preparing for a teaching career Must be admitted to Teacher Education Undergraduate or Graduate Minimum 2.5 GPA Preference given to students demonstrating financial need Successful recipients are eligible to reapply Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Seniors graduating in December are eligible to receive full scholarship in their last semester Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
